EmailTemplate.name: AP Delivered - Delivered to PO Box
EmailTemplate.subject: We've completed your delivery to a PO box on case {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Australia Post
Case {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!IF(ISBLANK(Contact.Preferred_Name__c),Contact.FirstName,Contact.Preferred_Name__c)},
Your delivery has been completed
Thank you for your patience while we’ve been monitoring your delivery. We are delighted to see it has now been located and delivered into your PO Box.
If this was too large for a PO box please check the box for a key to collect from a locker. If this was sent to your work or other business address please check in with the mailroom or building manager to find out about the arrangements for mail as it may be collected for you and be received later in the day.
Our website can help if you’re looking for alternative ways to receive your parcels in future.
Australia Post
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
